== Introduction ==

This page tries to help when debugging <nowiki>[[http://gnu.org/software/gnash|Gnash]]</nowiki> problems in <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gnash/+bugs|Ubuntu]]</nowiki>.

== Debugging procedure ==

* Ask for the output of `gnash --version`.
* If you report bugs upstream, make sure to include
** the link to the build log, available here: https://launchpad.net/ubuntu/+source/gnash
** information of the build including the sections
** `Configurable options are:` and
** `Configured paths for $arch are:`

=== konqueror-plugin-gnash ===

If problems are related to `konqueror-plugin-gnash`, ask for the output of `about:plugins`.
